name: BrainStorm (itch) (ja-818)
description:
In BrainStorm you are a game developer who needs to catch the right ideas for each part of his game during a BrainStorm. You will do this by catching the missing ideas for the project, and avoiding the repeated or incompatible ones.

This game was created as capstone project for UnityLearn's "Junior Programmer: Create with code 2" course. 

There were 2 requirements for the game:

  • The game must count something.
  • There must be a UI element displaying that count.
